abstract: Neighborhood Joint column on D'Amico Coffee Roasters, beloved coffee shop in Brooklyn's Carroll Gardens.
lead_paragraph: Old-timers at D’Amico’s, a Carroll Gardens coffee shop, are happy to chat with the younger customers bearing computers or strollers.

headline.main: At D’Amico Coffee Roasters, Old and New Brooklyn Meet
headline.print_headline: Where Old and New Brooklyn Meet

snippet: Old-timers at D’Amico’s, a Carroll Gardens coffee shop, are happy to chat with the younger customers bearing computers or strollers.
